name: Netvibes Dark
description: A simple dark theme for Netvibes apps.
additional_info:
Affects the internal style of Netvibes apps. Should work fine for the built-in Netvibes RSS views, Twitter, and Tumblr apps. Works best coupled with a dark Netvibes theme, such as Blackmamba, Darkvibes, or Exposition Pepper (pictured).


CHANGELOG

8/30/2017:
Fixing some Chrome-specific problems.

12/19/2016:
Updated to support Netvibe's new endless scrolling feature.
Timestamps will be displayed in header inline to leave more room for content.
New Netvibe's larger header in RSS feeds has been reverted to the previous smaller (but bolded) size.
Restored zebra-striping.
Added hover effects.
